title: Champion not in roster anymore
body: So I unlocked hecarim through hextech a bit back and never really got around to using him until I got in a queue and couldn't figure  out what to play until I remembered that I unlocked him. When I tried to search him though he never showed up in my champ roster and I couldn't find him, and im sure that I unlocked him. Not sure if a bug or not but help would be appreciated.

replies.body: I can see where you did get that Hecarim champ shard early on in Nov, but you didn't actually unlock him. You disenchanted that champ shard instead.
must have thought i clicked unlock instead of disenchant but still worst mistake ive made in a while
